patio.Dialog: I'd prefer if you didn't interrupt me in the first place.
Why did you bring Ravenette in here!? If I wanted to talk to it, I would've gone into the garage!
Response options: Sorry! I just thought that Ravenette might be broken.
They just wanted to see you.

patio.Dialog: Of course it's broken. The first twenty minutes it seems so promising, but the longer you stay working on it, the more you realize how stupid it is. It's fucking pathetic.
I really don't care. Now get out. You've overstayed your welcome.
Sure. I don't have a use for it anyways.
Is Ravenette broken? I guess it has been a couple months since I've gone into the garage...
I didn't program it like that.
What did I just say about inane questions?
The infininet is like the internet, but with even more stupidity.
Ravenette is an AI I designed. Based on the name you probably already guessed this, but it's based on a crow.
Huh? What do you want? Can't you see I'm in the middle of something here? Go talk to Ravenette in the garage. I can't be bothered to answer your inane questions.

garage.Dialog: Hello, I --CAWW!!-- am Ravenette. Is there any--CAWW!!--thing I can do for you?
Response options: Are you based on a crow?
Are you based on a raven?

garage.Dialog: No, I'm based --CAWW!!-- on an ostrich.
Why would I know that? --CAW!!-- I'm an AI limited to a tablet. How --CAW!!-- do you expect me to find one?
Response options: You're not connected to the internet?
Your on a portable tablet, but you haven't seen any of the house?

garage.Dialog: Sure, I'll just --CAWW!!-- go to https://houseblueprintsofrandompeople.gov.co.uk.us/nullbird. I don't have the wifi password anyway.
you don't have to rub it in...
Why are you asking me? --CAW!!-- my creator is just in the other room.

Response options: I'm just showing you the rest of the house!
PLAYER LIED TO RAVENETTE ABOUT NULLBIRD

garage.Dialog: Really? I'm kinda beholdent to your will anyway.

Requirements: PLAYER LIED TO RAVENETTE ABOUT NULLBIRD
garage.Dialog: --CAWW!!-- Really?! --CAW!! CAW!!-- I haven't spoken to them --CAWW!! CAWW!!-- since last Febuary! --CAW!! CAWW!! CAWW!!--
oh god im gonna be murdered

kitchen.Dialog: Everthing in a--CAWW!!--kitchen can kill me. For you, the worst thing that can happen is you burn your hand. For me, the worst thing--CAW!!-- that can happen is I--CAWW!!--violently explode in the--CAW!!--microwave.
I --CAW!!--wouldn't fare very well in the microwave, or sink, or refrigerator, or really anywhere.
...I don't want to be left here.

Requirements: PLAYER LIED TO RAVENETTE ABOUT NULLBIRD
patio.Dialog: --CAW!! CAWW!! CAW!!-- They really want to see me! --CAWW!! CAW!!--

Disqualifiers: PLAYER LIED TO RAVENETTE ABOUT NULLBIRD
patio.Dialog: --CAWW!!-- Is that Nullbird? Can I say hi? --CAWW!! CAWW!!--

Requirements: PLAYER LIED TO RAVENETTE ABOUT NULLBIRD
PLAYER LIED TO RAVENETTE ABOUT NULLBIRD
PLAYER LIED TO RAVENETTE ABOUT NULLBIRD

Disqualifiers: PLAYER LIED TO RAVENETTE ABOUT NULLBIRD
patio.Dialog: I wish I was still in the garage.

Disqualifiers: PLAYER LIED TO RAVENETTE ABOUT NULLBIRD
patio.Dialog: I don't know what to do now.

Disqualifiers: PLAYER LIED TO RAVENETTE ABOUT NULLBIRD
patio.Dialog: AIs can't dream, so I hope I'm going crazy.
